treatment.file: Mypullorum Mygallinaceum Mygallopavonis Myiowae Mycolumbinsale Mysynoviae Jordan et al 1982
treatment.description: Mycoplasma pullorum ferments glucose aerobically and anaerobically, does not utilize arginine or urea, and does not reduce tetrazolium chloride, show phosphatase activity, or produce film and spots. G+C content of DNA: 29 mol%. Serologically distinct. Type strain: CKK (= ATCC 33553 = NCTC 10187).
